document_data.name: Fenris Agathonn
document_data.mainbody: '''Fenris Agathonn''' was the Lady of [[Hawk's Nest]] sometime after the [[War of the Silver Marches]].
document_data.Relationship: Fenris was the wife of [[Arthus Cavilos]]. She was also the grandniece of Lord [[Taern Hornblade]] of [[Silverymoon]].
document_data.Activities: Fenris took care of her spirited daughters [[Lavencia Cavilos]], who wanted to become a wizard like her mother, and [[Eryl Cavilos]], who wanted to become a knight of [[Tyr]] like her father.
